__TOC__

Ubuntu Hour is a periodical meeting for Ubuntu users in Alexandria, Egypt. The aims of this meeting is to stay updated with the Ubuntu news and updates, help each others with solving problems, socializing and have fun.

This event was the first meeting in this city, and we hope to stay do it for a long period.
